Reviews.Title: “Winter Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Jimstillclucking
Reviews.Content: I must have been at a different Condo from a lot of the other "posters". As stated, the rooms are individually owned, so quality can vary. A lot of the rooms have totally absentee owners, so they are reluctant to do due diligence on the standards of their rooms. I guess if you have some slovenly types in before you, who live in a Pig Sty at home, then they are NOT going to care about YOUR cleanliness issues after they leave. However the room I stayed in,(205) was excellent with good amenities and clean towels and bed linen. No noisy neighbours or late night shouting in the Halls. They are Efficiencies, so YES, you do have to take out your own Trash and use the Laundry Room on 1st Floor for washing your clothes or Towels, depending on the length of your stay. The locatiion is unbeatable....right on the Beach...I even bought a Fishing Pole. Daytona Beach Shores Police also have a ZERO Tolerance to Vagrants or Panhandlers. So you never get hassle on that score. Winn Dixie is just across the street and down 400 yards. There is also a neat little Bar next door to Winn Dixie with a great selection of Beers from around the World. Would I stay there again? Already booked for this "winter".

Reviews.Title: “January 2012”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a cheaprooms.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Very nice place, clean room, staff were very responsive to our needs and requests. Would definitely stay there again when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: nichole b
Reviews.Content: The beach views were amazing. Unlike most hotels this one was very quiet even during bike week. The room is very spacious and the beds are pretty comfortable. We had 3 small children and 3 full grown adults in the room during the day and it did not drive us crazy. The refrigerator and stove were great features. The pool was nice and not dirty like other pools i have seen. Overall I would stay here again and i would recommend it to others. We had a great vacation and it is only 20 minutes from the nearest highway. Two thumbs up!!!

Reviews.Title: “The room was wonderful, newly redone, very clean, great view of the Ocean and in a good location.”
Reviews.Author: Michelle C
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to let you know how much we enjoyed staying in Room #518 in the Castaways. The room was wonderful, newly redone, very clean, great view of the Ocean and in a good location. We hope to be able to come back there on our future visits to Daytona. We especially liked having a manager on site in the office every day and knowing the security personnel were there gave us added assurance. It was nice seeing the maintenance people moping the front office every day and felt the building was well kept. We enjoyed working with you, Chelle Realty LLC and feel we were treated very well. Thanks, Bob & Barbara Garrett

Reviews.Title: “Very Satisfied -will come again”
Reviews.Author: Jessica E
Reviews.Content: My husband and I rented for 1 week in December 2011 from a individual who owns his condo privately, which I am told all of the condos are privately owned. I saw all the bad reviews, but the room we stayed in was clean, nicely decorated and clean linens were provided. The furniture was modern and in good condition. We were provided with the owners phone in case of any problems, but we had no complaints. Most of the people in the building while we were there seemed to be senior citizens. Pool area and halls were clean. We would rent again and were very happy with the rental price.

Reviews.Title: “Voted Biggest DUMP in daytona beach !”
Reviews.Author: Kate j
Reviews.Content: Im currently renting as of Nov 1st. 2011 -this place is filled with NOSEY OLD FARTS that do nothing but sit in the lobby all day and night and gossip as they snoop around all day trying to find something to complain about -the hallways smell so bad that I'm convinced a old women died in her room. -everything is broken in the rooms -we pay 50$ a month for internet, yet the front desk doesn't know the pass-code to sign on so we cant use it -bums will come and scour the laundry rooms cause all of the entries are unlocked at all times -the dryers are so dirty and older then i have been alive there is no sense in washing your cloths -the new owners dont have ANYbody working the front so forget it if you need anything -LOOKS NOTHING LIKE THE PICTURES ONLINE!!! maybe in like the 1970s -no game room and the restaurant is 10 minutes down the road -roach/mold infested -they tow cars every night at 2am so if your cars not marked with a registration sign forget it -anyone who says this place was a good stay is LYING this place should be condemned !

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay at This Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cat2440
Reviews.Content: My family and I have visited Florida on many occasions, but this was our first time at Castaways in Daytona Beach. It will also be our last. In fact, we left two days early. Our room was nothing like what appeared on the internet. It was shabby and poorly maintained. The housekeeping staff left towels but no washcloths our first night there. Security was nonexistant. No hotel staff was at the desk from 5pm until the next morning. The side entrance from the parking lot wasn't locked nor was there a secuity guard present. Anyone could have wandered in overnight. Our second morning at the hotel we discovered our car was missing! We had placed the hotel placard as instructed so we assumed our car had been stolen. My husband called the hotel emergency number, but no one ever responded. It wasn't stolen, but towed. Even though it was obvious we were registered guests, our car was towed!! After cab fees to go to the towing company and paying to get our car back, we spent $250. We talked to the front desk staff about the situation, but were told it was the condo association that was responsible for cars being towed. According to the staff, the condo association had a contract with the towing service. We asked for information to contact someone at the association, but it was never provided. The bottom line is that the hotel staff was unresponsive to our situation. While the beach was nice, it did not make up for the terrible conditions at the hotel and our car being unfairly towed. This is not a hotel for families. It is dirty, there is no security, the staff is unresponsive and the area nearby has adult stores and a gentlemen's club. We will NEVER go back to Castaways! \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

Reviews.Title: “Never Going Back”
Reviews.Author: APandaW
Reviews.Content: This is what my family calls a Roach Motel. It smelled like smoke all through the hallways and in the elevator and lobby. The elevator looked like it belonged on Tower of Terror, the stairs were nicer. The bed was a total canoe, and the soap dispenser was broken in the shower then left there! The room looked like there should've been a dead body in there (we checked luckily there wasn't). My family didn't even stay there the one night we had booked the room for.

Reviews.Title: “great getaway”
Reviews.Author: prozzero
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were pleased w/ the service and cleanliness of this hotel. Our room had a balcony with an ocean view, refrigerator and microwave. It was within walking distance of a cool minature golf course. A great place to get ice cream was a few minutes down the street. The staff was able to answer questions about the area and provide clean towels as needed. The room was cool, clean and quiet. It was nice to get away from the city and relax at the beach.

Reviews.Title: “I couldn't have asked for a better vacation”
Reviews.Author: christinab_08
Reviews.Content: I stayed in condo 606 with a friend for a week. The condo was just the right size and it was very clean and comfortable. The beach is just right outside the door, which was perfect. The woman who manages the condo was very friendly and offered us a great price. Daytona Beach is a great city with plenty to do. I couldn't have asked for a better vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Guest Relations HORRID”
Reviews.Author: thunderstruckIam
Reviews.Content: I have stayed @this hotel 5times in the past. This was the 1st time since NEw owners took over. The wife needs a course in GUEST RELATIONS. She is nothing short of Medusa. They are stingy with towels, won't even take trash out. Their Amenities list is a LIE- drunks in hallways trying to acost other guests, garbage and urine smell on the steps that lead to the beach. Sad this was once a very nice place for working families on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Great time”
Reviews.Author: wb51Orlando
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here in May 2010 just to get a way for a few days. We had a wonderful time!! The room was very clean, the staff was extremely helpful with anything we needed and the price was great! Thank-you so much we had a great time!!! I will be staying here again next time we are in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price”
Reviews.Author: Buffy80
Reviews.Content: We stayed in an oceanfront room on the first floor with a kitchenette. The room was nice but i did not walk around without my sandals. If you are like my family, you are there for the beach, not for the quality of the room. We had a great time and had no issues. The only things is the price has went way up since last summer. We payed about $40.00 a night. Now it has went up to around $100.00 dollars a night. Well worth $40.00 but I would not pay $100.00

Reviews.Title: “Great Price, Great Location, Beautiful Beach, and Wonderful Staff!”
Reviews.Author: d1xiegrl
Reviews.Content: We came in from VA on April 5 we drove through the night and we arrived at 8:00am in the morning. We stopped by the hotel and the front desk staff were very friendly and told us they would make sure our room was cleaned as soon as the cleaning staff arrived. They issued us our parking passes and allowed us use of the pool until are rooms were available. The gentleman on staff came out to the pool and let us know our room was available for check in...which was wonderful and very considerate due to the fact we were exhausted from the drive (well at least the adults in the group were...lol!). The room we stayed in was on the North Side of the building it was clean and spacious and had a great view of the ocean and the front desk staff were wonderful anything we needed they made sure we had. The hotel is under new management and you can tell they are doing everything they can to turn it around! The bar on site make great Pina Colada's and yummy food and the prices are really good! I would stay here again and recommend this hotel to any of my friends the price can't be beat, the location is great, and I can honestly say the hotel staff is truly wonderful!!!! Kudos to the NEW Castaways Beach Resort.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location u get alot for your money”
Reviews.Author: jimpell65
Reviews.Content: Decided to stay there and was impressed with the service they are under new management and you can tell the rooms are nothing like what I read on here they were clean and the front desk were polite as was the rest of the staff

Reviews.Title: “Let Me Explain”
Reviews.Author: sharkluver22
Reviews.Content: Bed folded into wall. Floor was sticky. Saw a roach. No toiletries provided. Comfy couch and chair. Kitchenette. Super cheap (we got a deal.) RIGHT on the beach, which was perfect for me. Would only stay again, if I couldn't get a better deal ANYwhere else.

Reviews.Title: “I will never come to this rat hole again”
Reviews.Author: kytravelgirlKentucky
Reviews.Content: Brought granddaughter back to college in Daytona Beach. Thought this was a fabulous price for an ocean view room. HA! Check in went ok. We had reserved and paid for 4 nights. Our room was on the 4th floor. Beautiful view, that is all! No towels or wash cloths. Sign in kitchen says "$25 charge for dirty dishes." But no dish cloths, towels or dish soap. Nice coffee maker, 2 packs of coffee. The coffee pot handle was broken and I spilled hot coffee all over the place. I asked for a different coffee maker and you would have thought I asked for a new car. Needless to say, still did not get one. The closet doors are broken and there is a greasy, dusty fan in the closet, sitting on top of an old night stand. Under the night stand was old ceramic tiles, a half sack of cement and an old cushon from a sofa.? I realized this is a storage closet. One floor lamp leaned 4 or 5 inches to one side. The table lamp's shade was completely off the wire rack that held it up. Got the picture yet? GROSS! The best is yet to come. We came back from the pool on the second day here to find a man in the bathroom. He said he was fixing the bathroom. I didn't know it was broken, but he was here for 2 hours. That meant that we could not use the bathroom, change clothes, etc. Then the 3rd day we were out on the boardwalk, and came back to the motel to find 5 fire engines and police in the parking lot. We jumpd out of the car to see what was going on. One of the skreeky elevators had caught fire and they evacualed the place. In our hurry to check out what was happening, we knocked the parking pass off the mirror and onto the floor of the car. Some time in the next hour they towed our car away. After arguing for an hour we had to pay someone to take us to the impound lot 10 miles away so we could pay $125 to get our car back. I hate this place. I have never been so aggrevated at a place in my life. DO NOT EVEN THINK ABOUT STAYING HERE!!! You will be sorry!

Reviews.Title: “Most affordable, nicest gettaway ever! ‎”
Reviews.Author: TheVacationerFamily
Reviews.Content: Where do we begin. Upon calling the hotel I got the room for two nights. I also got it cheaper than Priceline was offering it for and got the second night FREE by booking through the hotel itself. Upon arrival the front desk was extra nice. The clerk was name Kendall and she was very inviting. The room was clean and had a FULL SIZE FRIDGE as well as modest stove, microwave,and sink. The flat screen plasma wasn't very big but the ocean view was magnificent...we weren't there to watch TV anyways. When I asked for extra everything...I GOT IT! Pillows, shampoo, WHATEVER! Even got crushed ice from the bar (Mango's) to make my own drinks in the room...UNHEARD OF. Family of 6 spent a very nice and quiet time in Daytona Beach and the only time I moved my car was to go one block down to the closest Winn-Dixie to the hotel. Not to mention shops and gas stations right across the street. "TOO CONVENIENT". I read all the bad comments about this place and for lack of better words...HATERS! I went with the family and had exactly what the title says! Any questions...rickgarciaflorida@yahoo.com or sarahgarcia_florida@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: “THIS PLACE IN NOT FOR YOU, REALLY”
Reviews.Author: g0dsgift9
Reviews.Content: My Family and I were talk to badly and we book the two rooms for a week ,5 months ago and we had to call the booking com, to fax them our booking ,that was an hour,then when we came back from lunch, A young so-call lady with a nasty attitude gave our second room to someone else and when we went to our rooms,the family's kids that was there played on the bed,before they left, so I ask the young lady if they can chang the bed spreads cause the kids had played on the bed and she said,that they didnt played on the bed.she was not up in the room when i seen the kids get off the bed and went with ther family to there new room she told me i was lieing on the family and that we had to leave, all because i ask for the bed spread be changed, with out an argerment, we are black and the other family is white,I really hope that wasn't the reason. so don't be fooled by the looks or the family thang, this isbad news people. realy andthey don't have any maids,the family dose the so-call cleaning you mite get your bed change or you mite not. i only call it the way i see it.

Reviews.Title: “worst place ever”
Reviews.Author: dginflorida
Reviews.Content: Front desk staff was rude and un-concerned about their guests. Overbooked the weekend we stayed and didn't have enough rooms for all guests. Air conditioners leaked or didn't work. Nasty rooms. Bed bugs, roaches...not clean at all. Please don't waste your money. Can't believe it is even a 2 or 3 star resort..it should be condemed. You have to pay for ice and anything else you might need that comes "free" at other places. Worst place we ever stayed at in Daytona. Be very careful...you might catch a disease from the unclean rooms and regular people that "live" there and roam around the building. Housekeeping is family and will rob you blind when you are not in your room. Terrible...terrible...terrible. The photo of the toilet is better than the resort.

Reviews.Title: “Not impressed”
Reviews.Author: tishsuz
Reviews.Content: We had a lovely vacation for 4 nights. Unfortunately, there was no maid service for 3 of those nights, no ice and my daughter had to go back and fourth to get clean towels. Although the price was good, the hotel left a lot to be desired.

Reviews.Title: “THE WORST HOTEL THAT I HAVE EVER STAYED AT !!!”
Reviews.Author: HANKJRFAN
Reviews.Content: We Stayed 3 Nights And Did Not Have Maid Service Any Of The Days.We Had To Go Down To The Front Desk Each Day To Get Towels And Wash Rags And Trash Bags.We Had To Take Our Own Trash Out.Each Day We Went To The Front Desk,All They Would Say Is I'm Sorry.The Next Day It Was The Same Thing.We Stayed On The Second Floor And All Of The Second Floor STUNK REAL BAD,Even All THROUGH THE HALLWAYS.We WILL NEVER STAY THERE AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: “Run Away Screaming!!!”
Reviews.Author: wptaz
Reviews.Content: There are some things for which the Castaways cannot be held responsible. For example, the terrible weather was not their fault. The intermittend outages in cable and Wi Fi were likely weather related. On the other hand, let's be clear: this is no resort. There are mixed reviews about it and I know that the rooms are individually owned so there is bound to be some variation in quality. However, the rude little girl at the desk who mutters, "Whatever..." when you say anything to her is probably rude to everyone. We were not the only guests to be given rooms on the first floor (completely eliminating any possibility of a view) where the doors didn't open. Rude Girl didn't actually believe us but sent someone else who also was unsuccessful in getting the door to open. She reluctantly gave us a room on the 6th floor, as if it was one of the few remaining rooms, which is a joke. The good news: the 6th floor hallway did not stink like mold, old beer, and gas. The other good news (maybe): the door opened. The room was large, with a king bed, a couch, a chair, and a table with two chairs. It had a kitchenette with a new fridge and microwave as well as a two-burner hot plate clearly left over from the 1960's (likely the last time the hotel was updated and, perhaps, cleaned.) The king bed would have been lovely if not for the presence of our 12 year old daughter. We briefly debated the issue, checked to see if the sofa was hiding a sleeper (nope), and decided that sleeping three-to-a-bed was a better option than encountering Her Rudeness again. The 12 year old glanced at the bathroom and announced she would not be showering there which, given the mold on the shower curtain, was probably a good choice. The one blanket in the closet was probably purchased along with the hot plate and was scratchy and nasty. The bed felt sandy. Because of a near-hurricane level storm, the pool was cold and closed early. We did not try the restaurant or the bar and have no regrets about that. The next morning we chose to pack up and run away from the Castaways despite the fact that we had pre-paid for two nights. Ponying up for another room was well worth it.

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL SHOULD BE CONDEMNED”
Reviews.Author: tmcbeachgrl101
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for the weekend, when we pulled up, there was a sign on the front door stating that the hotel was condemned. And it should of been! The elevator barely worked. The first room they gave us was hideous, filthy, smelled so bad that I had them give us another room. The next room was so so, partially clean. There were pad locks on the cabinets, the tub had mold on it. There was a sign that said " 25.00 charge for unwashed dishes ". The hallways smelled horrible. Definetly would not recommend this hotel. Dont waste your money.

Reviews.Title: “The WORST & FILTHIEST place I have ever been!!!”
Reviews.Author: PeepsMcGee
Reviews.Content: We arrived too late at night our first night to make other arrangements unfortunately! When we arrived we had to wait for the front desk to finish talking amongst eachother & smoking cigarettes outside before we were checked in (about 5 mins). The lobby area was nothing better than ok, the rooms were filthy! We had to buy new blankets & cleaning supplies before we could even relax after a 22hr drive. The mattresses were stained the lampshades had mold on them along with the bathroom ceiling. We reserved two rooms, my mothers adjoining door wouldn't close, and she was handed a wrench & told to see what she could do!!! What Castaways fails to inform their customers of is that each room is individually owned ( I was told by one f the room owners). So if you have a problem there is nothing they can really do, because they don't own it. I am surprised that we didn't contract scabies from the place YUCK!!! Please check out my pictures before you decide to book there! It is cheap & you may get even more than what you pay for here!

Reviews.Title: “Dirty...Dirty...Dirty, But would stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: Stay_cv
Reviews.Content: Check in was nice and the lobby was very clean. Our room on the other hand was a filthy mess. I had to go to the store and buy cleaning supplies before we could even sit down. But after the cleaning was done....we had a great trip! The location was perfect and the room was only 30.00 a night for an ocean front, with free parking. If you dont want to clean....then this hotel is NOT for you. If you want to save money and clean a bit, then this hotel is perfect for you.

Reviews.Title: “Save Your Money for some Place Else”
Reviews.Author: pillahaug
Reviews.Content: Dirty dirty room. Carpet old and nasty. Toilet worked part time. Microwave needed cleaned. All wood furniture needed wiping off. Shower was an uncontrolable mess, water everywhere. Cheap plastic curtain waving in the breeze. Furniture well worn. Doors hard to open and close. Teeny tiny bathroom. Kitchen cabinet held together with tape. Wall around air conditioner filthy, sand all over. Long brown hair and black gunk on the sheets. Elevators sluggish. Parking lot dark. Could only lock door when leaving from the outside. Room smelled. Cooktop all rusty. Dirty towel left hanging on the back of the bathroom door. Decent TV. Nice fridge. Nice lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Had a Great Time!”
Reviews.Author: KDSS
Reviews.Content: I decided to take my teenage daughter and get away for the weekend. I researched many palces to get the most value for the money. Castaways was a great choice. I stayed in a first floor unit that had a kitchen which was very conveinient. When you walk out the back door the pool, beach, and restaraunt were right there. Very convienient. The room was clean, large and comforitable. The price was great and we had a lot of fun!

Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: blondiekat45
Reviews.Content: Don't have any expectations and you won't be disappointed. For the price - it's ok! Nothing fabulous. It is beachside, but not necessarily ocean view. There was no water when we arrived and the staff didn't appear too concerned - staff were friendly but not overly helpful. All rooms are different (independently owned) - our room was a nautical theme - beds have probably been there since the hotel opened - we rolled to the middle. There appeared to be some recent updates but a smokey odor loomed throughout the halls. Pool was very nice but colder than the ocean water. Like most of Daytona Beach hotels, not very comfortable but manageable for a weekend at the beach....

Reviews.Title: “Clean and safe!”
Reviews.Author: C-levellover
Reviews.Content: Priced right for what you get. Clean and safe. Good atmosphere. Plenty of parking. Pool gets sun most all day long (not hidden by hotel after 2-3 PM). Bar/lounge food was good enough. Karaoke and/or live music every night.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place and Price”
Reviews.Author: misslaurynt
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Castaways and had a great time! This is a good affordable condo hotel. My room was nice and clean and the building was too. Staff was friendly and helpful. I read the reviews for this hotel and booked anyway because the price was right. It was not at all what alot of these reviews say or at least it isn't now.

Reviews.Title: “NASTY! Not for kids!”
Reviews.Author: mycasmommy
Reviews.Content: We just stayed in this hotel last week(Aug. 2007) and I feel I need to share my feelings so nobody else decides this would be a good choice to book. We checked this place out for the price. You get a view of the ocean and they let you see a room before you check in. However, this is not the room you get! The first room we got had a smell so foul it made my eyes water. It can only be described as cat urine and B.O. We imediatly switched rooms and found the second room to be so dirty and nasty that we went out and bought our own blankets to sleep on. i would not let me daughter walk around with bare feet and we surely did not use the shower. My husband ran into the cleaning lady in the elevator and she was irate because another room had asked her to reclean 3 times. I think this hotel should be condemend. it is no place for a family and I wouldn't even want to stay if I was a yound springbreaker. Actually I am pretty sure that some of the springbreakers left us all a souvineer of vomit on the large vent in the room!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: skip69
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here before, was impressed with the room the staff and thier friendliness Great place to stay will be BACK

Reviews.Title: “Wow!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: VirginiaJamest
Reviews.Content: if you are looking for a hotel that has clean rooms,friendly staff, maid service,tv with remote that works,ice machine that works,comfortable beds,clean windows.this is not the place. P.S . if you stay for the price,bring your own mop,broom, towels,toilet paper,ice and lysol.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, defintely a motel”
Reviews.Author: tommyl72
Reviews.Content: This place is nasty, good thing i only stayed one night. More of a motel than a resort. Do yourself a favor stay somewhere else, you will thank yourself later. Only good thing is the view which is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: dbmom
Reviews.Content: I was afraid to stay at the Castaways after reading some of these reviews. We had two rooms and both were clean with new paint and carpet. The hallways of the hotel need to be updated but other than that it was fine. The pool is great and so was the beach. The staff was friendly. There were no problems. We had a new ac unit and a great ocean view.

Reviews.Title: “P.U.”
Reviews.Author: Bobspal
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night and room was only fair. Futon couch had urine stains all over it, smell in hall was absolutely horrid. Looked at three rooms before found one acceptable enough to spend one night. Desk clerks helpful and nice, but this place needs a total makeover and soon. Hideous halls and smells. Not a bargain.

Reviews.Title: “Remodel Has made great improvments”
Reviews.Author: daytonaorbust
Reviews.Content: The hurricanes did some damage that took over a year to fix-but now it is wow.The neg reviews can be cancelled as this place is on its way to be one of the nicest family run places in the Shore thanks to the new owner association..The resturant on site was awsome! See for yourself-thanks Jackie -Kelli and Stephanie for the friendship and good times memorial day and the owner who care about Their building.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: getupandgojax
Reviews.Content: We stayed just one night at the hotel since we were in town for a one day event. When I read some of the reviews, I was apprehensive. But I was pleasantly surprised. The man at the front desk was very helpful. Somehow paperwork showed us having three reservations although we just made one with only one room. In fixing that, he gave us the best room of the three. The overhead light and ceiling fan in our room was operated by a remote control. The remote turned out to have no battery and when we requested one we were told that they had none to fit it. But the man at the front desk did go through and collect us enough lamps to provide the lighting we needed. He was apologetic and very accomodating. He helped with directions, suggestions, etc. The hotel is right on the beach as promised. We had to figure out how to get to the pool, but once we did, we cut right through to the boardwalk. All the rooms had their own balconies with furniture. The room, pool, and hotel in general were in good condition for a hotel in the middle of renevations. A lot of the doors were taped off from being painted, and some of the locks were covered. They did have a weight room, game room, and laundromat. It's right across the street from a mini golf course, and there are restaraunts and shops all along A1A. It is not top of the line, but it's good for the money for just a stop over with decent accomadations.

Reviews.Title: “penthouse suite”
Reviews.Author: Demetre
Reviews.Content: Booked our stay thru VRBO.com - 1600 sq ft condo facing atlantic with 45 ft balcony -GREAT location on beach - Hotel in finishing stages of remodeling little noisy during day but not enough to become a distubance looking forward to return visit but penthouse is a must

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: robertOrmondBeach
Reviews.Content: great place - my family came in for the holidays and the front desk person was very nice to them. the room they had was very clean and had a great view of the ocean. had a very nice lounge also. great place

Reviews.Title: “What a Dump”
Reviews.Author: lowpsi
Reviews.Content: I stayed here during Biketoberfest October 19th-22nd. I can tell you I will never be back (to Castaway's Beach that is). Upon check in (11:30pm) we were greated at the front desk by a person that had absolutly no personality. Once we got our key we made ou way to the elevators. Upon entering the elevator the door closed and the elevator dropped down suddenly, not far but enuff to scare the *&#$ out of you. Also we noticed both elevators had expired inspection certificates from Volusa County. We stayed on the 4th floor. Upon entering our room we noticed a "stink" almost of stale air and bug spray. The carpets were filthy, the floor by the door was sticky and there was dirt and crumbs in the corners. The bathroom sink wouldn't drain unless you wiggle the stopper. The fridge was leaning back, almost as if it was missing the two back feet, although it did keep the beer cold. The room had a stove top and a microwave which worked well. The lighting was horrible, but probably strategic as I don't think you want to see this room with good lighting. The shower floor was gross and the bathroom towels were not much better. Fortunatly I had brought towels to wipe down the motorcycles. (We used those to dry off and used the hotel towels to clean the bikes) The closet door had one door on and the other was laying inside the closet. There was a vacuum in the clost almost suggesting if you want it clean DO IT YOURSELF!!! The drapes were hanging off the curtain rod. The beds were fairly comfortable, but didn't dare pull the sheets back to see what condition the matress was in. The TV Worked, however very small. Oh did i mention the carpets were dirty. My white socks were almost black after only a few minutes of walking on this floor. Late at night / Early Morning upon entering the bathroom and turning the lights on, the residents are very surprised to see you and scamper for shelter. (ROACHES)!!!! That explains the bug spray smell. On Friday I received a call from Houskeeping asking if I wanted more towels, I said yes. As of now I still have NOT received my towels. The hotel was under construction at the time, however I was not at all disturbed by it. I was there to party so I didn't spend much time at the Hotel, just to rest a couple hours overnight. Thank GOD I went with another male friend. If I had taken my wife and daughterI would have checked out minutes after check in!!! If you want a cheap place to stay(SPRING BREAK, Bike week, Biketoberfest, ETC) and don't mind the simple things like clean floors, bug spray, and dirty towels then OK. But don't expect much at all. I have seen much better for the price, but haven't seen anything worse.

Reviews.Title: “Could not get our room”
Reviews.Author: Snowbird969
Reviews.Content: We flew in from N.Y. went to check in no clerk. Could not get our room. We had to drive around and find another hotel. It was terrible. We had friends with us and it was embarrasing. When we walked into the desk the place stunk something awfull. Maybe it's a good thing they had no clerk I don't think it would of been a nice stay. What a way to start a vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Don't even think about it !!!”
Reviews.Author: allan09828
Reviews.Content: On check in , once the correct room key was made, the door opened and the smell and disgusting room was revealed, cancelled room but manager would not return our deposit, they also overcharged on the deposit which I am still trying to dispute. This is such a bad hotel , do not even think of staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Breath Taking”
Reviews.Author: jandon$
Reviews.Content: from the time my two children and i got off of the elevator our breath was taking away.the smell reminded me of a friends wet basement.the room i paid for was a nonsmoking but as we entered the room there was a freshly dumped ashtray wainting for me on three leged table.i strongly advise anyone brave enought to stay here pack your cleaning supply and clothe pins.

Reviews.Title: “Nasty, Run-down and smelly”
Reviews.Author: toria74
Reviews.Content: We checked in July 13, 2006 for three nights and I must say we should have turned around as soon as we got off the elevator. The hallway carpet was very nasty and smelly. When we got to our room there was urine all over the toilet, bathroom floor and there were roaches. I did call the front desk clerk and we were moved very quickly however it left a bad taste in my mouth. There was one good thing about the hotel that I did enjoy and that was Mango’s Lounge, nice people, great staff and clean restrooms. The Castaway is under renovation but I don’t believe it’s for the guest rooms only the balconies. This place is nothing like the pictures they have on the internet so don’t be fooled.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and comforatble!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: After reading these reviews I hesitated in making my decision however the class of the hotel made me go with it anyways. It was affordable and i am not sure if they remodeled it after seeing the horrible reviews they received but either way I stayed in a beautiful beachfront room which was very clean and romantic. I know that many of you think the good reviews are written by the hotel staff but I am just a picky graduate who wanted to relax in the beach and found just what i needed regardless of my limited budget.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel I have ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. From killing over 30 roaches every night, the maid just laughing and saying she noticed them but could do nothing, the ceiling falling down in the bathroom, the balconies and pool closed due to construction, the odor and the general rundown condition of everything. The only good thing that happened in this hotel was when I checked out.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, Location and Price”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Castaways the week after Memorial Day and enjoyed every bit of our stay. It rained the entire time, but between Mango's (the resident restaurant/grill) and other activities we were able to make the most of our vacation. It's true that the staff is very lackadaisical about things, but this is pretty common in most beach areas, especially when teens are part of the staff. One thing to note about staying at this hotel is that you pay for your room at check in. While it wasn't a big deal, it did catch me a little off guard. It's just a different practice than what I'm used to, but I'd planned to pay it at some point. It's actually kinda nice paying up front when you're on a budget. The view was more than I expected; we stayed in an Oceanview Studio and were located right on the far left corner. We had a view of the ocean, pool, the parking lot and the golf course across the street. Our neighbor was a resident at the Castaways and he was very friendly. He talked to us about the area, and all the good places to go. As we hung out in Mango's every night, we found that year-round residents at The Castaways are common. Everyone we met in Mango's from the staff, to the locals were nice in every possible way. The room itself was pretty nice -- we had a refrigerator, microwave, dresser, table and sitting area. There were also dishes and utensils for use if we needed them. The bathroom was set up so that the only thing enclosed was the shower and toilet -- the sink is in the foyer and features somewhat of a dressing area. There was no mold in our bathroom, and the floor tiles were decent. Some of the furnishings were old, but everything in our room was presentable, and in fine working condition. My only gripe was the hard bed, but again -- for the price I paid nightly for the room, I was more than happy to have it. Overall, I have nothing but good things to say about The Castaways. I could see how this isn't the first rate choice for families as it's not geared toward that crowd, but it's perfect for couples searching for a good value in a quiet area on the strip.

Reviews.Title: “nice!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had a great time in Daytona! the Castaways is a decent hotel for the price. The hotel is in need of repairs, but so is the Hilton. They had a hurricane come through, so I understand. Our room was very clean, the maid came and did a great job each of the 5 days that we stayed there. We were on a limited budget, but wanted to stay in a clean hotel on the water, it was great! The view from our room was amazing! The staff was also very helpful; they let us know that the room we booked had problems with the balcony, so they let us look at several rooms and pick the one we wanted. Good choice for the price!

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs down!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Sandusky. We left Castaway Bay after two days and went to the Kalahari. Castaway By was a dump. The staff was rude and under trained. Upon leaving we discovered mice had chewed holes in some of our "munchie" bags. The room was damp and smelled bad. Housekeeping rarely did anything. The tub had mold and mildew on it. The web site is very deceiving.

Reviews.Title: “Bad experience”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My family has just returned from a stay at the Castaways Hotel. This hotel was a bad choice for our vacation. The hotel messed up our reservation and had to book us in 2 different rooms during our stay. Upon check-in, I asked if we could leave a few days early without penalty to avoid a move and the answer was "no." In addition, our room flooded and we had to move a third time after requested by us and the maid. The hotel staff also accidently canceled our last night reservation, and would not aknowledge what had happened. The hotel staff was not sorry for any inconviences that they had caused. The staff was mostly rude, uncaring, and unprofessional concerning their role in customer service. Furthermore, the tile floors were dirty and the carpet in the halls smelled. We will never stay at Castaways again. P.S. I did show my hotel confirmation papers to them upon check-in and when they lost our last night reservation and it meant little to them.

Reviews.Title: “Beware! Be careful how you make your reservation for this hotel”
Reviews.Author: JustJoan77
Reviews.Content: I have previously written a review about this hotel which was none too favourable to say the least, however since returning home things have gone from bad to worse. I made my reservation on the 8 February with placestostay and a pre-payment of $177 was made for my reservation The prepayment was taken by a company called World Res which just left the local taxes to pay on arrival. I stayed 3 nights from 13-15 March. I returned to England on 27 March. On 8 April Castaways Beach Resort took a further $177 from my credit card. It seems that they have not received payment from World Res for my reservaton so they just took it from my card without any authorisation. It has now been left to me to sort out this mess. Both placestostay and worldres have automated email systems so the only way to make contact with them is to make costly international phone calls. I have called the hotel and World Res to try to get a refund and to date I have not received any. Castaways have said that I should contact World Res for a refund this I have done on 4 separate occassions without any success! Surely the hotel should have taken up the payment query with World Res not just taken the amount from my card!! I have now reported this to my credit card company who are now investigating the problem on my behalfI personally would not recommend anyone to make a reservation with placestostay.com or recommend anyone to stay at the Castaways Beach Resort in Daytona Beach. Be warned!!

Reviews.Title: “Castaways is a good place to get away”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We went to the Castaways to look at the condo units as an investment. We stayed at a few other condo-hotels the weekend we were there and found out that this one is by far one of the better ones in the area. yes, the building is older but the units are clean and in good condition. There are variances in the units but most are generally good. All of the staff members and individual owners we met were very nice. the place is not fancy but it is very reasonable for the price. We had a lot of fun in the lounge at night. We enjoyed this place so much that we will be investing in a unit there.

Reviews.Title: “What a dump!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Check in March 25, 2004 - I don't know where to start. As soon as you pull into the parking lot you will see how run down this property is. When entering the first room we were confronted with a huge roach an outdated room and a dirty bathroom. When complaining to the front desk they thought I was crazy and said I was the first one to ever complain and stated that they never saw a roach on the property. I requested a refund so I could move to another hotel but they gave me the run around and told me that I had to give 24hrs notice and would not refund my money. I then requested another room and the second room was worse than the first. When turning down the bed I found hairs and a huge blood spot on the blanket. The next morning I found another small roach in the bathroom sink. I then complained to manager and was able to check out early and was refunded the amount for the weekend but NOT for the night I had to sleep in filth. I would NOT recommend this hotel to my worst enemy. I wish I found this web site before making my reservations!!!

Reviews.Title: “A bit of a Dump”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: When we pulled up outside the Castaways my first impression of this hotel were not good. It is run down, shabby and smelly. The receptionist wasnt the least bit welcoming or friendly. The building inside is old and shabby and when we entered our room there was this smell I dont know what it was but I didnt find it very pleasant in fact I bought a room freshner to try to improve the smell but the smell seemed to be impregnated into the carpets, the bed linen, towels, everthing. We only stayed for 3 nights I didnt unpack my clothes for fear of them becoming smelly. I definitley would not go there again. The place is a dump.

Reviews.Title: “Not Impressed”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I was not at all impressed with my stay at the Castaways during Biketoberfest. The hotel was nothing like the description I got when I made my reservation. The building is run down and needs to be updated.I would not refer this property to any of my friends or family.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Castaways”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The Castaways is one of the nicest place we've stayed. The rooms are spacious and very clean. My daughter and I go every year and stay because we feel safe there. It's right on the beach and very relaxing. The staff will go the extra mile to make your stay wonderful.

HotelInfo.Name: Castaways Beach Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 2043 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
